teams.name: Endangered Beekeepers
teams.loan_because: "We ought to do good to others as simply as a horse runs, or a bee makes honey, or a vine bears grapes season after season without thinking of the grapes it has borne."  -Marcus Aurelius
teams.description: We support honeybees, their keepers, and all who toil season after season to do good for the human hive.   Our team photo is of Carmen, a Peruvian beekeeper and Kiva loan recipient.

teams.name: Friends of Pete
teams.loan_because: We support those who want to help themselves and are financially responsible in making better lives for them and the people around them.
teams.description: We're helping others help themselves through small loans and then when those loans are repaid we reinvest in helping others who need help.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
teams.loan_because:
"Thou shalt share, that none may seek without funding."   A nod to VII.  of “RANDOM NUMBER OF NOT COMMANDMENTS, SUGGESTIONS"  in the LOOSE CANON:
http://www.loose-canon.info/page17.htm
teams.description:
Members of the Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster  

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: UU Church of Olinda
teams.loan_because: As Unitarian Universalists, we are called upon to be of service to humanity (see uuolinda.org)
teams.description: The UU Church of Olinda exists as a haven of religious freedom, offering fellowship, knowledge and inspiration to all who would seek truth, live responsibly and courageously, and be of service to humanity.

teams.name: TeddyGraham's 50th Birthday $50,000 Kiva challenge
teams.loan_because: It's such a fantastic way of doing something good in the world.
teams.description: This team is my way of celebrating my upcoming 50th birthday by getting more of my friends and acquaintances involved with Kiva

teams.name: London
teams.loan_because:
Looking for Team members who want to become more involved in promoting the team and expanding our membership. Contact Richard to join the leadership. 

If each team member posted a link to this team on their favourite social media site we should see a spike in membership.. 520 as at 15th March 2013

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Wales
teams.description: For all lenders from Wales, in Wales or with a love of Wales.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Give Green - Environmental Loans
teams.loan_because: We want the world to be a better place.
teams.description:
Made of individual kiva lenders who are concerned about the environmental impacts of their loans. This is a forum to notify each other of environmentally sustainable loans that are needing funding. Sustainable development projects include recycling, solar, re-use, organic agriculture, health, etc. 

We support enterprises that care about the earth and all of its inhabitants. We have no religious, racial or political affiliations of any kind. We want to encourage sustainable enterprises that recycle, reuse, repurpose and use environmentally sound agricultural and manufacturing practices. 
Many of us would like Kiva to develop environmental standards or criteria for their lending practices to prevent environmental impacts that would increase poverty for future generations.
Many people want to have a green portfolio, or at least a green component. 
Won't you join us in creating true sustainability that includes a healthy environment?

teams.name: Jewish Donors and Friends
teams.loan_because: If we can, this is the right thing to do!
teams.description: A group consisting of Jewish donors and those who feel close to Jewish values.

teams.name: VoIP Users Conference
teams.loan_because: We care about the world
teams.description: We are a group of individuals who meet weekly on the Internet to discuss telephony.

teams.name: Humanist
teams.loan_because: It takes people to help people.  We believe in good.
teams.description:
Humanists strive to live good and ethical lives, with no belief in the supernatural.  We give meaning and purpose to our lives through reason, compassion and action.

Most Atheists and non-religious people ARE Humanists, but don't realize it!

Our team helps the poor, builds the Humanist community and shows that non-religious people give, care and share.

We are endorsed by the American Humanist Association, British Humanist Association and International Humanist and Ethical Union.

teams.name: Team Europe
teams.loan_because: We think Kiva is a unique opportunity for people all over the world to assist entrepreneurs in improving their businesses and communities.
teams.description: We are European lenders (EU, EFTA, and all those who feel they belong) who share the belief in Kiva's vision.

teams.name: Monash University
teams.whereabouts: Monash University, Australia, South Africa and Malaysia

teams.name: Kiva turns 7! Birthday party at Loop, Melbourne on 22 October 2012
teams.whereabouts: Loop, 23 Meyers Place, Melbourne - Monday 22 October 2012
teams.loan_because: it is Kiva's 7th birthday! Let's celebrate 7 years of small change making a big difference in the world
teams.description: Melbourne lenders and friends getting together to celebrate Kiva's 7th birthday

teams.name: Poverty2Prosperity.org - Poverty-Escape
teams.loan_because: Poverty2Prosperity.org (P2P) is all about Poverty-Escape. Please join our fun team and put Poverty-Escape in the lead!  See how to get your I'm a Kiva Loaner Bracelet and more by participating on Team P2P - visit our web site for details!
teams.description:
One of P2P's major poverty-escaping projects is to participate in making microloans through the Kiva platform. See the web site for details on all of our projects. Also see our Perpetual Fund lender account which allows people to designate funds for perpetual loaning here on Kiva, http://www.kiva.org/lender/P2PPerpetualFund

We have a special purpose fund to keep loans from expiring. Please join us at http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans to see currently funding loans from the SOS Loan fund.

NOTE:  Poverty2Prosperity is also a non-profit, and any messages not related to Kiva or Poverty2Prosperity may be deleted.  If there is an idea you would like to share, contact one of the Team Captains to get permission.  Thank you for your consideration.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Orlandoers
teams.loan_because: Heaven Is A Place On Earth
teams.description: Eponymous

teams.name: BOINC AT AUSTRALIA
teams.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to improve their life through hard work, perseverance and a little help from a friend.
teams.description: We are a group of individuals who use BOINC (http://boinc.berkeley.edu/) and our computers to do scientific research at Universities around the world. Join us at our website. Everyone is welcome.

teams.name: Third Culture Kids Everywhere
teams.loan_because: As an international culture group, we know quite intimately the reality of our global interconnectedness.  We are brothers and sisters, and we are one another’s keepers.  Some of us are in need of a loan, and some of us are able to make that loan.  Kiva.org helps us to facilitate what comes next, and that is a beautiful thing.
teams.description: A third culture kid is a person who has spent a significant part of his or her developmental years outside their parents' culture. The third culture kid builds relationships to all the cultures, while not having full ownership in any. Although elements from each culture are assimilated into the third culture kid's life experience, the sense of belonging is in relationship to others of the same background, other TCKs.

teams.name: Bloggers
teams.loan_because:
bloggers and their readers are generous people too. You don't have to run a blog to join the group. If you do run a blog, invite your readers/fans to join the group!

Just like blogs, our  money and support have no boundaries either.
teams.description: This group was created to bring together all types of Bloggers and their readers&fans who lend on Kiva.

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: Quebec
teams.loan_because:
We want to help.
Nous voulons aider.
teams.description:
The political status of Québec is a province within the country of Canada (although a portion of the population would prefer Québec to become sovereign in the future).  The Parliament of Canada has recognized the Québécois as a nation. The largest city in Québec is Montréal, and the capital is also called Québec (Quebec City). The official language of Québec is French.

If you'd like to come and visit us, the official tourism site of the Québec government is at http://www.bonjourquebec.com

teams.name: Goons Without Borders
teams.description: SomethingAwful.com lending group.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Quilters International
teams.loan_because: Because we can
teams.description:
We are men and women who practice the creative art of quilting.  Most of us create quilts and give them away to loved ones or charities and this group is just an extension of that spirit. 

The team is open to anyone, you don't even have to quilt - maybe your grandmother or another family member did, maybe you design or sell the fabrics or manufacture the machines or notions quilters use- all are welcome.

teams.name: Team USA
teams.loan_because: We believe in the generosity of the human spirit that is still alive within Americans of all backgrounds.

teams.name: Kiva Team Italia - Italy
teams.loan_because:
"Migliorare la vita degli altri migliora anche la tua" ....   .....  ...........
Improving lives of others also improves yours
teams.description:
Una bella fotografia della nostra splendida realtà… Bellissima, variegata, colorata, vivace… unica…. Italiana!!!!

teams.loan_because: Together we can make a difference
teams.description: People of Pakistani background from all over the world

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas
teams.loan_because: We are big-hearted Texans and citizens of the world who enjoy sharing our prosperity and making a positive difference in the world.
teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Norway
teams.loan_because:
We have Cold Weather - Warm hearts !
We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:
Bruk denne linken for å invitere dine venner til teamet her:
http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm
Hjelp med "expiring loans": http://poverty2prosperity.org/sosloans/#fundraising_loans

teams.name: 30 By 30
teams.loan_because: On October 24, 2011 Rachael turns 30.  Instead of 30 drinks, how about 30 loans? (You wouldn't want to leave the Birthday Girl lending alone, would you?)
teams.description:
We are smart, passionate and enterprising people who all had their arm twisted into making a loan in honor of Rachael's 30th birthday. It's the greatest birthday present ever: empower people, support Kiva, trumpet entrepreneurship, celebrate in style -- all things Rachael loves.  (Her liver doesn't mind this plan either...)

*Update:  Maybe we'll rename the group (More than) 30 by 30! There's still plenty of room to come and join the celebration!

Don't know Rachael?  Make a loan to celebrate! Just beware of her "getting to know you" questions. (You've been warned.)

teams.loan_because:

We believe that providing microloans to entrepreneurs in developing countries is the socially responsive way of helping people break the circle of poverty. 

We promote Kiva.org as a sustainable and transparent way of connecting lenders and borrowers from across the globe.
teams.description:

http://www.kiva.org/team/norway/recruit

Det er flott hvis du trykker Facebook "anbefale/recommend" knappen oppe til høyre  på denne siden. Vår facebookgruppe: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Kiva-Norway/193432017389484

Anbefalte lån "sikrere" lån: 
http://www.kiva.org/lend?sortBy=partner_default_min=0&partner_default_max=0.5&partner_risk_rating_min=1&partner_risk_rating_max=5&partner_arrears_min=0&partner_arrears_max=1.1&sortBy=repaymentTerm

teams.name: Kiva Austin Texas

teams.description:
a delightfully diverse group of Austinites. Be proud, Team Austin--our Kiva team is second only to NYC (with nearly 4X as many members!) for total lending for a city team. 
And a hearty WELCOME!! to all our new members.

teams.name: Kiva Detroit
teams.loan_because: We want to champion small businesses in Detroit!
teams.description:
Kiva Detroit is the first Kiva City, a program where Kiva works with community organizations in the United States to provide local small businesses with microloans. 

The goal of the Kiva Detroit team is to empower Detroiters to champion local small businesses through Kiva. 

To double your impact, your loan to a Kiva Detroit borrower will be matched 1-to-1 by the Knight Foundation

teams.name: Kiva City
teams.loan_because: We support small business owners in the United States.
teams.description:
We support small businesses and want to do more to bring Kiva to cities in the U.S.

If you are interested in loaning to small business owners in the U.S. or if you want to help bring Kiva to your city, this team is a community to expand the reach of Kiva in America.

teams.name: Ubuntu
teams.loan_because: Ubuntu: 1) An ancient African word meaning 'humanity to others' or 'I am what I am because of who we all are'.
teams.description:
Ubuntu: 2) A Linux based operating system that powers desktops, servers, netbooks and laptops; bringing the spirit of Ubuntu to the world of computers.

This is a team for the Ubuntu Linux community to show our support of microcredit and Ubuntu.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Para México
teams.loan_because:
We work hard and have been fortunate enough to give a little back to our country México.
----------
Trabajamos duro  y hemos sido los suficientemente afortunados para poder ayudar un poquito a nuestro pais México.
teams.description:
This team is open for: 1) Anyone interested in supporting entrepreneurs in Mexico.  2) Any Mexican interested in supporting entrepreneurs around the world.  3) This group is just open to everyone!
----------
Este equipo esta abierto para: 1) Cualquier persona interesada en apoyar microempresarios en México. 2) Cualquier mexicano interesado en apoyar microempresarios en todo el mundo.  3) En realidad este grupo esta abierto para todos!

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142

Anna Maria, Apollo Beach, Balm, Belleair, Boca Ciega, Boyette, Bradenton, Brandon, Carrollwood, Citrus Park, Clearwater, Clearwater Beach, Dade City, Dover, Dunedin, Durant, Gibsonton, Gulfport, Indian Rocks Beach, Innisbrook, Land O' Lakes, Largo, Lithia, Longboat Key, Lutz, Kathleen, Madeira Beach, Mango, New Port Richey, Odessa, Oldsmar, Palm Harbor, Palm River, Palma Ceia, Palmetto, Pasco, Pinellas Park, Progress Village, Redington Beach, Riverview, Ruskin, Safety Harbor, Saint Pete Beach, Saint Petersburg, Sarasota, Seffner, Seminole, South Tampa, Sun City Center, Tampa, Tarpon Springs, Temple Terrace, Tierra Verde, Town 'n' Country, Treasure Island, Valrico, West Chase, Wimauma, and Zephyrhills.

teams.name: Episcopal Church in the United States
teams.loan_because: As Episcopalians, we are followers of Jesus Christ, our Lord, and believe in the Father, Son and Holy Spirit.  We strive to love our neighbors as ourselves and respect the dignity of every person.
teams.description: The Episcopal Church is part of the worldwide Anglican Communion, and traces its heritage to the beginnings of Christianity.  We celebrate our unity in Christ while honoring our differences, always putting the work of love before uniformity of opinion. We believe in amendment of life, the forgiveness of sin, and life everlasting.  All are welcome to find a spiritual home in the Episcopal Church.

Secular vs religious Field Partners, see links at http://atheist-monkey.blogspot.de/2009/08/kiva-mfi-checker.html

For Kiva tips and who knows what the FSM will move us to add for mutual benefit & merriment:  
http://flyingspaghettikivans.blogspot.it/    

and
  https://www.facebook.com/pages/FlyingSpaghettiKivans

teams.name: Safe Girls Team
teams.loan_because: By empowering girls and women in the fight for women's rights, poverty reduction, education and health promotion, we are helping to create a fairer and better world for everyone.
teams.description:
This team supports the work of Kiva, improving the lives of people around the world who have limited financial means, and who would not otherwise have the means to improve their lives, those of their families, and their communities.

We also raise awareness of the issues of  violence against girls and women including fgm, education, maternal health and human rights.

This month we deal with the issue of Human Trafficking, a problem fuelled by poverty, and one which affects millions of women and children every year.

 A video explanation of what Trafficking is:

www.no-trafficking.org/

 A personal account:

http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/europe/7243612.stm

Videos:

www.theguardian.com/global-development/audioslideshow/2013/dec/11/human-cost-sex-trafficking-prostitution-audio-slideshow

www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-canada-18144333

This four week free of charge course on Human Trafficking begins on 20th August, 2014.

www.coursera.org/course/humantrafficking

 Detailed information about child trafficking:

www.childtrafficking.com/Content/sitemap.php

 To report a trafficking crime:

 In the USA:

www.fbi.gov/about-us/investigate/civilrights/human_trafficking

 In the UK:

https://crimestoppers-uk.org/get-involved/our-campaigns/national-campaigns/human-trafficking

Courses our team members might be interested in joining for free: 

Coursera:     
                                              
https://www.coursera.org/course/water 26th May, 2014

Edx:

Resilience https://www.edx.org/course/uwashingtonx/uwashingtonx-ecfs311x-becoming-resilient-1652#.UznR_Gco-M9  6th May,2014


We have been informed that “It is against Kiva’s terms of use http://www.kiva.org/legal/terms to use team message boards or personal lender pages for self-promotion or to solicit funding for things not related to Kiva.”

For anyone needing further information about Kiva's policy on people requesting money for themselves, other individuals or organisations on Kiva web pages please contact Kiva.

Safe Girls Team Captains.

teams.name: Aussie & Kiwi Savers
teams.loan_because: We love the idea of giving people a hand up not a hand out.
teams.description: Aussies & Kiwis who are members of a savings website

teams.name: Kiva Portuguese Translators
teams.loan_because: We want to support Kiva entrepreneurs in every way we can.
teams.description: We are Kiva volunteer translators and friends who are inspired to support Kiva entrepreneurs with our translation skills and with loans.

teams.name: Windsor Ontario
teams.loan_because: To use our good fortune to help others achieve their goals.
teams.description: People from Windsor Ontario Canada.

teams.name: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency
teams.loan_because: We care about people striving to enhance their economic self-sufficiency and wish to support their entrepreneurial endeavors. It just takes one small step by each of us lending on kiva. Together we can make it easier for hard working people to get the much-needed capital to sustain and grow their business. We feel blessed to be able to support the aspirations of so many loan recipients who persevere tenaciously for a better quality of life with dignity. Kudos to Kiva.org that allows us to connect for this common cause.
teams.description:
In our team, we have a vision to change lives in novel ways. Our team's origin began with a Kiva Card (gift certificate) whose recipient founded this team. Inspired by Kiva Fellow, Jessica Heinzelman's talk, our founder dreamed to take us on a cruise, beyond the realm of lending targets and team statistics. Frequent & occasional lenders are free to choose who to lend to, how much and when in an amiable team ambience nurtured by Kiva Fellows, Kiva Editor & Translators, artists, writers, entrepreneurs, workers, retired people, families, parent + kid(s), students, teachers, and professionals. Our diversity & portfolio enable our discovery of social values inherent in the Kiva micro-lending ecosystem whose issues we debate objectively. Experienced members are gratified to enhance our grasp of nuances in lending. We wish to work with volunteers in the team, Kiva Friends, http://kivafriends.org and our supporters to engage in activities that promote Kiva. Our journey to strengthen and grow the Kiva ecosystem has room for more. JOIN NOW, and check out our team, to convince yourself that it can be your team too.

LINKS TO SEE ALSO:
1. Kiva Updates:http://www.kiva.org/updates/kiva 
2. KF Blogs:http://www.kiva.org/updates/fellows 

(Thanks Anh D Pham for letting LOTUS team on Kiva to use the exquisite image of the lotus flower you photographed in Vietnam)

teams.name: Computer History Museum, Staff and Volunteers
teams.loan_because: We are making a difference, one bit at a time.
teams.description: We are staff and volunteers dedicated to preserving the history of the computer age in stories and artifacts so that the impact of computers on society can be better understood in the future.

teams.name: Twitter Friends
teams.loan_because: the microlending method empowers the entrepreneur to grow and develop their business enabling them to succeed on their own
teams.description: diverse group of people brought together 140 characters at a time

teams.name: 43things
teams.description: We're all fans of the website 43things...

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Kiva U Colleges
teams.description:
Kiva U-College is an international network of microfinance clubs that gives university students an easy way to play a direct role in changing lives. Kiva U's mission is to educate students about the potential impact of microfinance, and to encourage microlending through Kiva's lending teams. 

Kiva U is world-wide and it continues to grow. In the coming school year, Kiva U will provide its chapters with the infrastructure and resources they need to establish a permanent presence on campus. The program will offer its chapters a variety of opportunities to participate in competitions and conferences, and will strongly encourage intra-university collaboration.

teams.name: Kiva U Schools
teams.whereabouts: High Schools Across the United States

teams.name: I love Jonny Price
teams.loan_because:
We love Jonny,
Jonny loves loaning -> we love loaning

teams.name: Just Fine With It Kiva Lenders
teams.loan_because: We find a worthy borrower.
teams.description:
Please join the Happy Kiva Lending team!

It's a like minded team with a lot of momentum!

We don't mind if Kiva lets members make loans to people in the U.S. If you don't like it, just don't make your loans in the U.S. Duh!

teams.name: Happy Kiva Lenders
teams.description:
We Happy Kiva Lenders think Kiva is great and are happy to see Kiva lending to everyone including US citizens.  - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
People in need are people in need regardless of where they live.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 


Our Goal is to show our support for Kiva's decision to fight poverty everywhere!
Please join us Happy Kiva Lenders and showing your support for Kiva by lending to whomever you want! 

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

 You can help in 3 ways - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -   
1) Join this team! - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2) Make a loan!  - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
3) Share this page with your friends! - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  - - - - - -  

 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 


Through our numbers and our loans we'll let Kiva know that they have our support in fighting poverty everywhere!

teams.name: The Meadows School MicroBank
teams.loan_because: As Margaret Mead said, we "never doubt that a small group of committed and dedicated people can change the world. In fact, it is the only thing that ever has."
teams.description: We are a student group from The Meadows School that is doing what we can to make the world a little better place.

teams.name: Williamsville East High School
teams.loan_because: We learn every day about people struggling around the world and recognize that it is an ethical necessity to help alleviate their suffering in ways that are available to us. We realize that Williamsville East is privileged to be a fantastic educational institution - something which everyone around the world deserves to have as well.
teams.description: We are a team of students, faculty, and alumni from Williamsville East High School - a public school in Western New York known for its students' high level of awareness and involvement in helping others.

teams.description: World Language Students who care and want to participate in the  change that microloans can provide to third world nations.

teams.name: Kiva Walk
teams.loan_because: Because we know the benefit of someone providing a 'hand up' both in our work and throughout our life.
teams.description: Founded by a 8.5 month walk across the USA in 2010, the KivaWalk Lending Team is a growing movement of Kiva champions that use walking to teach and instill Kiva's mission while also connecting us to the profound benefits of life at 3mph.

teams.name: Kiva Intern Alumni
teams.loan_because: We have experienced the true power of Kiva!
teams.description: We have volunteered at Kiva in a variety of capacities, from social performance, to grant writing, to developing the volunteer program. When we finish our internships at Kiva we maintain a connection with one another, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Table Tennis
teams.loan_because: The Table Tennis community is interested in helping to improve people's lives around the world.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

***TEAM WEBSITE***
http://apluskiva.wordpress.com/

teams.name: milepoint
teams.loan_because: As travelers we have seen poverty first hand and are committed to making the world a better place for all.
teams.description: Travelers who collect miles and points and seek free flights, hotel rooms and upgrades where possible. Here we seek to give back and invite everyone to join with us and make a difference.

teams.name: Team NOAA
teams.loan_because: Helping others in a small way goes a long way in helping the earth, the oceans, and the atmosphere.
teams.description:
We are National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) employees (and friends of NOAA) who lend because it  embodies our agency's core values of people, teamwork, ingenuity, science, service, and stewardship.

Tags: marine, atmosphere, ocean, weather, satellites, earth, NMFS, NOS, NWS, OAR, NESDIS
